Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are gearing up to hear some exciting news as the Federal Budget for 2023 is about to be unveiled. According to the posts this year's budget is set to extend eligibility for struggling single parents with almost $2 billion in aid and help those on Centrelink payments. Excitingly the program preview for Tuesday at 7:30 PM AEST is going to offer live coverage of Federal Treasurer Jim Chalmers' presentation. It will be a must-watch for Aussies who want to stay up-to-date with the country's economics.
